Test Name: Pediatric Autoimmune Encephalopathy/CNS Disorder Evaluation, Serum
Purpose: To detect CNS-related autoantibodies in serum for evaluating and diagnosing autoimmune encephalopathy/CNS disorders in pediatric patients.
Container: Red-top tube or serum separator tube (SST)
Equipment: ELISA kits, centrifuge, pipettes, microplate reader, incubator
